root.message: The SDG_INDICATOR field for indicator 5-3-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Показатель 5.3.1: Доля женщин в возрасте от 20 до 24 лет, вступивших в брак или союз до 15 лет и до 18 лет
Indicator 5.3.1: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
